ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought the lizard blood potion, or whatever it is was a Gate to the Cazic Wizard Gate? My main use for Gate would be to return to FV or wherever every
ygData.messageBody:
I thought the lizard blood potion, or whatever it is was a Gate to the Cazic
Wizard Gate?

My main use for Gate would be to return to FV or wherever every evening.
Otherwise the druid or wizard, if we had one, would have to tp us to
Dreadlands which we'd then have to traverse the entirety of. Don't really
need it as an escape route.

Kit

Gate would be a nice effect to drop off a level 20 mob. It does drop off
level 35ish mobs (the cenobite? in CT? And PoF mobs too drop a wand with a
gate.) And they need to make Shaman potions reasonable - to make and to buy.
But its a low level spell.
